name: Stratosphere: Multiplayer Defense
description:
***** Featured 3 times by Apple in over 50 Countries *****
**** One of Apple's "Best Games You've Never Played" ****
Two players, one iPad. Multiplayer strategic defense.
NEW in v2.0: challenge the world in online Game Center multiplayer!

Grab one side of an iPad and play as one of three unique teams, taking on your opponent with defensive towers and 12 different creatures that you can send to assault their gates.

Miss the magic of playing board games with friends? Transform your touch screen into a realtime, interactive strategy game and challenge friends of any skill level. Stratosphere is easy to learn, but has many layers of strategy to master.

Whether you're face to face with a friend or playing over the Internet, Stratosphere is whole new, multiplayer take on the TD genre.

*****

"Stratosphere: Multiplayer Defense takes the TD genre to a whole new level through its multiplayer gameplay style."
- 148apps

"I love that the multiplayer is on the same device because it feels very much like a board game. I just love everything about this: the visuals, the music -- very electro-dancey -- and I really like that it was made by only two people, which really shows that it was a work of love."
- Reviews on the Run, G4TV

''Stratosphere features a brilliantly executed multiplayer mode and a great visual presentation which makes this title an overall easy recommendation.''
- iReviewT

"Stratosphere offers a lot of fun, especially when you are playing head to head with a friend. We have never seen a tower defense game like this."
- AppGefahren.de

*****
• NEW in v2.0: Game Center online multiplayer (iOS6+)
• Two player multiplayer on a single iPad
• Zero load screens
• Three unique teams to master
• 4000+ combinations of modes
• Singleplayer mode with 60+ missions to complete and three levels of difficulty
• Unlockable levels, modes and character costumes
• Retina graphics
• Game Center leaderboards, achievements and challenges
• Live, online planet where you can influence the overall tide of war

Feeling a bit lonely? Play singleplayer against a Stratobot to hone your skills, complete missions, and unlock awesome new levels and costumes to show off to your friends.

So jump into the battle raging on mile high platforms above a polluted, alien world, and fight for your place in the stratosphere.
